Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Bayer Contour Next blood glucose monitoring system
Bayer Breeze 2 blood glucose monitoring system
Bayer Contour blood glucose monitoring system
Bayer Contour TS blood glucose monitoring system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucose Meter-Check Solution, a glucose quality control material for Bayer blood glucose monitoring systems.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use to assess performance of Bayer Contour Next, Breeze 2, Contour, and Contour TS blood glucose monitoring systems by healthcare professionals and individuals with diabetes at home.
